com.soctec.soctec.achievements

Class AchievementUnlocker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soctec.soctec.achievements.AchievementUnlocker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class AchievementUnlocker
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Handles created achievements that are not yet completed, checks for completion
    Version:
    2.3
    Author:
    Carl-Henrik Hult, Joakim Schmidt

                           Stats stats)

      • loadUnlockable

        Restores the unlocker from save file

        public void saveUnlockable()
        Saves the unlocker to file

      • receiveEvent

        public void receiveEvent(int type,
                         java.lang.String content)
        Handles events based on type and causes checks of Demands to be triggered
        Parameters:
        type - What kind of event that was triggered.
        content - The information that came with the event.

      • registerLivingDemand

        public void registerLivingDemand(Achievement owner,
                                 Demand demand)
        Registers a new Demand as running, and starts it in a thread
        Parameters:
        owner - the Achievement the Demand belongs to
        demand - the Demand

      • startLivingDemands

        public void startLivingDemands()
        Starts all Living Demands in their own Threads

      • stopLivingDemands

        public void stopLivingDemands()
        Stops all Living Demand-Threads

      • checkLivingDemand

        public void checkLivingDemand(Demand demand,
                              java.lang.String value)
        Checks Living Demands for completion (See checkUnlockables for more info). This method always runs on MainActivity's UI Thread.
        Parameters:
        demand - the Demand to check
        value - the value that is compared to the Demands requirement

      • checkUnlockables

        private boolean checkUnlockables(int type,
                                 java.lang.String content)
        Does a check of Demands of all Achievements in unlockableAchievements and removes the Demands that met the requirements specified in parameters. If a Demand is removed, does a check if the owning Achievement is completed. Any completed Achievement is added to the recentlyUnlocked list.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of Demand
        content - the requirement of the Demand
        Returns:
        true if an Achievement was unlocked

      • doRecreate

        private void doRecreate()
        Recreates Achievements found in recentlyUnlocked and then clears the list

      • wasLegalScan

        public boolean wasLegalScan()
        Returns whether the last scan made was legal, i.e: the person was not scanned recently before
        Returns:
        true if recently scanned

      • getUnlockableAchievements

        public java.util.ArrayList<Achievement> getUnlockableAchievements()
        Returns the unlockableAcievments list.
        Returns:
        unlockableAchievements

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable observable,
                   java.lang.Object data)
        Receives data from classes that it observes, if that data is class Achievement the method adds data to unlockableAchievements -list.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        observable - is either AchievementCreator or Demand
        data - data received from classes that AchievementUnlocker observes.

      • createTestAch

        public void createTestAch(java.lang.String achi)
        Only for testing purposes
        Parameters:
        achi - definition of Achievement to create
